title: S7E13 – "Echoes of Eternity" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Kevin David Anderson, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about cryptic calls, dangerous detours, heavenly harbingers, and interior invaders.

Go to https://NordVPN.com/scary and use code SCARY to get 68% off a 2 year plan plus 1 additional month free. It’s risk free with Nord’s 30 day money-back guarantee!
